3.text: Dip a cotton ball in nail polish remover and scrub any scuff marks.

4.text: Cover any areas you don’t want to be painted.

5.text: Sketch your design out on paper.

6.text: Lightly trace the outline on your sneakers with a pencil.

7.text: Trace over the outline with a paint marker.

8.text: Use acrylic paint and micro-detail paintbrushes to paint sneakers.

9.text: Add a thin layer of paint to 1 side of the sneaker.

10.text: Flip the sneaker and paint the other side.

11.text: Apply 3-4 more layers to both sides of the sneakers.

12.text: Allow the paint to dry for 1 hour and remove the painter’s tape.
